scripts.fclean:all: npm --prefix backend/services/game-service run fclean && npm --prefix frontend run fclean
scripts.build:all: npm --prefix backend/services/game-service run build && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.install-build:all: npm run install:all && npm run build:all
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend/services/game-service install && npm --prefix frontend install
